lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Kiva is a brilliant organization, and although I don't have large amounts of money to loan it allows me to feel like I can still help someone worlds away from me.  I also love being able to follow up on the progress of the business and person that I'm trying to help.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Prior to my injury, I received an MBA in entrepreneurship, and value the autonomy and excitement of having one's own business and being one's own boss, particularly small or family-owned businesses, that may grow and develop into large corporations.  Additionally, I am intrigued by entrepreneurs who are self-made, come from little means and have a creative vision, and further, find the drive and focus to actually execute on their vision enough to support their families, despite the odds being against them.  It is highly impressive and I support and respect these entrepreneurs on the Kiva website, who are taking charge and have the initiative to make their goals and dreams come true, and I am very happy to help enable them on their journey in some small way financially.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: In 2001-02 I was a volunteer in Mombasa, Kenya, and every day I saw a disabled man pedalling a rickety homemade cart across a treacherous crossroads with his hands. He was a cobbler and worked on a street corner. I was overwhelmed by his determination and tenacity. Around that time he received a microcredit loan and later I saw him featured on a TV documentary, talking with pride about being better able to provide for his family despite being unable to walk. That's when I stopped putting it off and found Kiva. We all share the same planet, how can we afford not to help each other?!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in conservation - helping to protect the reef & rainforest in north east Australia and find a balance between use and non-use.

*Why Not?

I have 5 sons.   As sole support for the boys, money has always been an issue.  First husband died, 2nd owes over $75,000 child support.  I opened a children's clothing shop w/ very little money years ago, it got us through.  Work towards your dreams, have faith in yourself , pray and don't give up.   :  )

I can only hope that my loan helps to alleviate some of that misery by giving hard working people a chance to succeed.

We also enjoy helping with that "final push" towards raising the needed capital, especially to those in the Transportation sector.
lenders.occupational_info: Check-Six.com offers aviation history and adventure first-hand...

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: It makes an impact to others. I know that my money is being used for a great cause. I have had my own business helped by loans and want to help in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a very nice taxi. I drive a big black SUV. I take people to and from the airport, from their home to restaurants and back, and sometimes they rent my time by the hour to take them and their friends to a concert or a sports game. My business is like a limousine.

lenders.name: MERRY GALE & MARIN
lenders.loan_because: At this time in our lives my husband & I feel blessed and abundant and want to share our financial abundance with others.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to give others the same opportunities that I have had to be successful.

lenders.name: Dorian and Morgen
lenders.occupation: IT technician and public health professional
lenders.loan_because: We received this as a wonderful wedding gift.

lenders.name: Eileen and Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to share some of God's good graces bestowed on me and mine.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Adm Supervisor of 450 bed hospital. Married 54 years with 2 sons and 2 granddaughters, great grand daughter and one grandson.

lenders.name: Annahita
lenders.loan_because: I like helping out the less fortunate.  I have received many gifts in my life and I enjoy giving back.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I Can, and you should!
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate

lenders.name: Sophie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Phu Styles
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women to be independent and to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Wardrobe Styling and Image Consulting

lenders.name: Jeannine
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see someone build a successful enterprise, one that will support themselves and their family!

lenders.name: ANGELA
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Don & Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in pay back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the COO of a charity that has helped southwest Native American students get an education for over 40 years.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a computer answering phones for a newspaper.

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise two young girls.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: I design buildings which are good for the people in them and the environment.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do right now!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers/software for manufacturing medicines.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility
lenders.occupational_info: attracting new students to attend college so they can better their career opportunities

lenders.name: Karuana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a better life for yourself.  I'm happy to help someone else in their work to live a better life. We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make better decisions for their family and relationships.

lenders.name: Laurence
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it does good. People need a chance to show what they can do for themselves.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping one another is a path to world peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach government workers technical writing and ethics, especially about using their authority wisely.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to as many people as possible. Just a small way to give back for all that I have been given in life.

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: No one deserves to suffer because of where or to whom they were born. Only when the global community comes together to relieve each other of the day-to-day struggle of living can we even begin to make true human progress.My mother is a refugee from Cambodia and my parents toiled to raise me. I feel like contributing to others helps me repay the debt I owe to them, and as a way to help other children grow up in safe, nurturing communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a pre-medical student in California.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves an opportunity to pursue a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom to a baby girl

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: My father was a cowboy. I loan in his memory, he who helped so many. My uncle, his brother, just passed away and I also loan in his memory.
lenders.occupational_info: I like learning, about anything but especially about how things work in other countries. I am amazed at the ingenuity of humankind in figuring out ways to better themselves and their families and honored to be able to enable some people to realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Noelle
lenders.loan_because: We all need each other to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm part of the airplane team who helps people to travel around the world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
I can and have been enabled to do so.

"We are the generation that can, therefore we are the generation that must." (Bono)

but more importantly:

"Do not withold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act."    -Proverbs 3:27
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a  Clemson University student, but more importantly, I am a Christ Follower who has been blessed far beyond what I could ever imagine or certainly deserve. God has given me the life he has for a reason and has enabled me to serve others, so I will.  I am so blessed to be able to serve and glorify Him, especially in such a capacity as this.

lenders.name: Jung-chieh
lenders.loan_because: Try to be good

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: there is need and Kiva.org seems like an effect way to make positive change happen faster.
lenders.occupational_info: Analyze risk associated lending company's money.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: The best way to help people is to help them stand on their own and be productive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help big companies organize their information.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: who wouldn't?
lenders.occupational_info: a student

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: (1) it is  the right thing to  do.  (2) It is good fortune that I have the education and resources that I have;  therefore I need to share them.(3) I want to  be a silent stakeholder in the businesses I help so I  can watch them grow and  celebrate their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading and study skills to first year college students helping them make the adjustment from high school to college

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: So they can have a business that works well and provides money to their families
lenders.occupational_info: I've been involved in Pace University's Model Montessori UN (MMUN) program.  The picture of me was taken in the UN general assembly hall.

lenders.name: TERESA
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise a family

lenders.name: Kenji Iwase
lenders.loan_because: Payback for the people who helped me and my wife during travel all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Now I impotr US soybeans (for tofu), wheat and Cnadian canola (for crush).

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: Without other people's helping hands, I would not be where I am today.
lenders.occupational_info: I make  the technical functions of software understandable to the sales team, press and analyst.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a chance to better themselves/ situations!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Beauty Products ( Shampoo, Styling Products and Salon Equipment to Salons )

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to do good things and help the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a U.S. Marine.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to see God's redemptive work around the world, and figure this a good way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help cities run better.

lenders.name: Mark Holmes
lenders.loan_because: The world is a better place when everyone has a chance to follow their dreams.  My experiences living in Guatemala taught me that $25 can mean the difference between eating or not.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer in the medical billing industry.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: These borrowers pay back their loans at a FAR greater rate than borrowers at any bank in the United States.  I have made hundreds of loans and have not had a single default.  I believe that my loans are really helping to make a difference in the lives of these people.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Because it's a great way to make a worth while investment in a persons life. It's an honor to be able to partner with someone who is pursuing a dream, goal or simply looking for an avenue to better care for themselves and their family,
lenders.occupational_info: My company provides Marketing and Management solutions designed for small and medium size businesses.  I also speak on the subject of economic development.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people who want to help themselves all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty with communication.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It's the type of charity that keeps on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses grow through connecting buyers and sellers online.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because:
it's the right thing to do.  Knowing that the money is going directly to the people in need makes it feel that much better.  A small amount to me can be life changing to someone else.  

I wish I could do more.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.  Entrepreneurs can have a conscience too!
lenders.occupational_info: I helped build  www.getitnext.com to help people save money shopping on the internet.

lenders.name: Donayt
lenders.loan_because: We have so much to offer yet give so little. It is time we helped to make a change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Donayt is a search engine that allows internet users everywhere to make a difference.
Spread the word and help Donayt change the world.

lenders.name: M&M
lenders.loan_because:
It's an enabler of opportunities and does not create a dependence on charity.

Let's be honest, the act of "loaning" for a social cause is it's own benefit.  In other words, I feel better about myself just by participating, and believing that I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Help companies determine if their cell phone causes TV or radio problems.

lenders.name: Kerrien
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is everyone's problem. It cuts across any line you can name: age, race, social, geographic or religious. Whether you are black or white; rich, middle-class or poor, we are ALL touched by poverty.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It is only a small loan, but I like the idea of being able to help someone less fortunate than myself in a most constructive way.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with numbers and other people has always been a very rewarding  My job is Interesting, varied and most certainly a challenge.

lenders.name: EVE
lenders.loan_because: It's fast, easy, and feels good to be making a real difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to care for our four children, who home school.  My husband has a chimney cleaning/lining business.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I am happy when I can help

lenders.name: Friends in Fredonia
lenders.loan_because: We believe it is one of the best things we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are trying to add the little bit we can to try to reach a tipping point ...

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower individuals to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching English at Osaka Christian College in Osaka, Japan for one year.

lenders.name: Kimi
lenders.loan_because: I know that building a strong economy is one of the best long-term way to change lives. And I believe that educated locals can make better choices than most foreigners, so the money and the power goes to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I study psychology.

lenders.name: Beit Ariella
lenders.loan_because: Jewish sages teach that the greatest form of tzedakah (charity) is making a loan to help a person start their own business.  Kiva lets me do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Marit Bromark
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help change the world.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because:
An old man walking along the beach at dawn sees a young man picking up a starfish and throwing them out to sea. 

"Why are you doing that?" The old man inquired. The young man explained that the starfish had been stranded on the beach by the receding tide and they'd soon die in the daytime sun. 

"But the beach goes on for miles," the old man said. "And there's so many! How can your effort make any difference?"

The young man looked at the starfish in his hand and without hesitating threw it to safety in the sea. 

He looked up at the old man, smiled and said, "It will make a difference to that one."

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: i can!
lenders.occupational_info: i help people operate stores.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I beleive these people deserve a chance to get out of poverty which is artificially created by few greedy people or nations.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: its a great way to have a personal connection to people the world over.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make better laws for communities in the coalfields of the Appalachian mountains.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: We have too much and it should be shared.
lenders.occupational_info: Software.

lenders.name: Daryn and Lily
lenders.loan_because: the people I loan to get more bang for the buck than I do
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are both consultants in the IT Industry.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I feel loaning money through Kiva is a way I can help someone who is trying to improve the quality of life for themselves and their family but  needs a little assistance.  I've been blessed in so many ways  in my life and I feel it's the right thing to do to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm not working at a "paying" job at this time, so I have the privilige of volunteering at several local agencies who help make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help those less fortunate.  I'm happy that I'm able to do this and thankful to kiva for enabling these loans to be made.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a volunteer management consultant for nonprofits.

lenders.name: Josh and Shey
lenders.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Vadim
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a hand up not a hand out, a great idea someone once had. I believe the only way to improve this world and enrich everyones life is by bringing up economy, and giving a purpose and direction to peoples lives. And with my limited experience, capabilities, knowledge and resources, this is the best outlet for my beliefs.
lenders.occupational_info: Aside from being a full time student, I also consult and sell wireless communication products and services.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I wanted world peace for my birthday.

lenders.name: SALIOU
lenders.loan_because: I loan some money so that I can revalorize my trade and put a some money for my studyies, because it is me who pays my studyies with my small trade and the studyies of my little brother. I am a student in physic, but I want to mak computer ingineering, but it is necessary to have some money. It is for that after my courses, I do a little job, and a little trade to meet my needs and pay my study fees.
lenders.occupational_info: At the beginning I worked like a receptionist, after a coffee manager, to start. After I took my economis to buy goods, to eat, and cigarettes, and the various ones which I resells after the courses. It is like that my trade is going on.

lenders.name: TreeGoddess
lenders.loan_because: Providing for your family is priceless.  Being able to lending a small amount of money to help someone achieve this makes me feel like I'm helping to make the world a better place for all of our children.

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I CAN AND THERE IS A NEED WHEN I WAS IN NEED PEOPLE WHO COULD, DID AND NOW THANKS TO THEM I CAN SO THIS IS MY THANKS TO THEM TO CARRY ON WHAT THEY STARTED WITH ME
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A UNIT OPERATOR IN A REFINERY MAKING PETRO PRODUCTS I GIVE THE REPAID FUNDS  TO THE NEXT LOAN SO THAT THE PEOPLE WHO REPAY ARE THE ONES LOANING INSTEAD OF ME  IT IS THEY WHO KEEP THE WORLD TURNING empowered by the fact that repaying their loans make them the lender and no longer the borrower,a force set in motion that changes lives.!!!!!!YES!!!!!!

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: There is no need for poverty on this abundent planet. I started a business from nothing and it is now very successfull and I want to share that and hope the recipients will in turn help others. It's a small world after all!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fashion designer and clothing manufactorer and retailer.

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.loan_because: I can make more of a difference with several loans rather than one donation. It is so rewarding and fullfilling, why wouldn't you want to help someone?

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: From each according to his ability, to each according to his need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help wire homes and businesses to use the energy from the sun to provide their electricity.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Who doesn't need a helping hand?
lenders.occupational_info: Creating Shelter - one home at a time

lenders.name: Rick & Laura Rabner
lenders.loan_because: We like knowing that we can have an impact, however small.
lenders.occupational_info: Rick is an attorney and Laura is a marketing and tourism manager with a real estate company specializing in retail.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I have been given way more than I need.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I hope my small loans help make a difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell houses.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who need help.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving back
lenders.occupational_info: I produce two daily international newscasts .

lenders.name: art
lenders.loan_because: i believe that hard working people should be helped.

lenders.name: Chris D.
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this model is an inspiring and sustainable way to alleviate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in energy finance, particularly lending to renewable energy projects.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: My life has been so blessed and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise Student Teachers who are in the process of earning their Mathematics teaching credentials.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: so many other people have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people record information about their own native languages and I teach students how to communicate with people from other cultures.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I designed, oversaw construction, inspected and operated traffic signalized intersections and systems in Southwestern Pennsylvania around Pittsburgh.

lenders.name: Dan , Ann & Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
Dan; I started and built my business because someone trusted me and made me a loan.
Ann; I want to help someone with a dream~
Amanda; Our daughter wants to help people in need for their businesses
lenders.occupational_info: I got my first home loan 25 years ago. I lived in that home while I fixed it up and sold it for a profit. I fell in love with Real Estate and went full time 20 years ago. I fix and sell homes, have rentals and loan cash to home owners. I love my work and the great abundance it has provided.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to reach their goals.  Sometimes it takes just a little help to realize a dream.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Funding a recipient's aspirations can have a profound and lasting effect.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: My students and I held a car wash to raise money for KIVA because we wanted to do something to help others in need.  We donated $100 to four business we wanted to support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a middle school teacher at a small school in Jackson, Wyoming.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day; if you teach a man to fish, he will eat for life.  Cheesy, cliche, but very, very true.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that all of the money in a company is tracked and recorded accurately.  Basically, I do a lot of math for a living.

lenders.name: Tristan PM
lenders.loan_because: loans change lives

lenders.name: Kathy, Jeff, Jake, Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life even if it's just a little bit at a time.  If I need help, I hope someone will have compassion for me so I want to do the same.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I may be able to help someone build a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have several people in my life to lend me a hand when I needed help.  I hope that I can do the same for someone.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I can help others, and I get the money back to give to someone else? Why the heck wouldn't you do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I compose music for movies and TV shows.

lenders.name: Raouf & Mahasti
lenders.loan_because: we are originally from Iran and now Canadian Citizens. We wouldn't be in this country if this chance had not been given to us by nice Canadian people. We understand that if we were in Iran we could not be any help to others since we could not make enough money ( comparing to a professional in Canada)! So by doing this, hope to be a little bit useful for others. If anybody just can put aside 1% of his/her salary each month, it is going to be something for people in developing countries!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I've been looking for a direct way of help people in other parts of the world and Kiva seems to be just what I'm looking for.   Love seeing a picture and knowing more about the people who I lend money too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from full time work.   I did computer programming for over 30 years.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
The stories of both the borrowers and the lenders are truly inspiring, 
and the possibilities for this world are truly incredible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: I want to see as many as possible lifted out of poverty, and the only way to do that is through economic opportunity and freedom, not gifts
lenders.occupational_info: I support trading systems in global bank

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to assist people to become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Roz
lenders.occupation: Mom of 3,  Wife of 1 & RT to many in need
lenders.loan_because: Even though we are not rich and my husband works 2 labor intensive jobs and I spend many hours every week at my job, my family still has more than others.  I am blessed and grateful.  As I know those who need help are.  So why not help even if it is something small.  Every small act of kindness ends up something bigger to that someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have trouble breathing or live with respiratory illnesses.  I work in emergency situations or just with every day medications.  I concentrate on the lungs (pulmonary system) and even help those who get really sick and need to be put on a machine to breath till they get better.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: any little bit helps.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses grow  by letting others know more about what they do.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I was once at a hard place with small chidren to raise. I hope to help others smile because they too can do it!  good luck
lenders.occupational_info: I give people new hair  styles. It makes people feel good to look good. It also helps to get and keep jobs in the US

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing exactly where my money is going; because it's direct, no middle-man; and because I think helping people help themselves is ultimately a better solution than just giving money away

lenders.name: Santa Catalina School
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to introduce world geography and social justice! As a privileged Catholic school, "bursting our bubble" is not the easiest experience. Kiva provides a wonderful teaching tool to our students at Santa Catalina School.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I know these people stuggle every single day and I can not imagine the kind of poverty they live with.  It makes me happy that my loan will help them and uplift them and in turn I am repaid with their happiness.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate structural failures and construction accidents to determine cause.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: its the most amazing tool to directly help individuals
lenders.occupational_info: as a small local business, we design, fabricate, sew and upholster custom furnishings for peoples homes and businesses

lenders.name: Kerri
lenders.loan_because: After seeing this organization on TV, I felt that I was able to help even if it is in such a small manner...someone who is really trying to help themselves.  I wish all of them the best of luck and good furtune!!
lenders.occupational_info: My job...well let's see.  Most of my day is spent in my office, collecting rents from tenants here in Michigan.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: My mother and I went through great financial difficulties after my parents divorced when I was in high school, so I know how it feels to have to rely on the generosity of other people to get you through day by day.  Today I attend college and have all of my financial needs met through scholarships, grants, and federal loans so I have extra money that I can loan out now.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Lending money to enterprising people makes me feel blessed.  I find that I appreciate the things I have and mourn less of the losses in my life when I am consciously thankful.  I love seing those 100% repaid notices, because I know how awesome it feels to finish payments on something.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: There are so many reasons! It definitely makes me feel great. I love that I am able to make a difference across the world. Also, I think it makes a bigger impact than outright donations. My first loan was a few years ago, and reloaning that same sum of money has contributed to several successful businesses! Amazing.

lenders.name: Lisa and Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful way to connect with people all across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep all the computers and other technology working in a middle school (students age 12-14) in Saint Paul, MN

lenders.name: Indy Ladies Who Launch
lenders.loan_because: Many people have been wonderful in supporting me in becoming an entrepreneur, and I want to help other women do the same in areas of the world where there are less opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting individuals in achieving a more dynamic and fulfilling life through workshops and one-on-one coaching.

lenders.name: Reine
lenders.loan_because: I was raised by a single mother for most of my life who taught me to never give up no matter what the circumstances.  Now it is time to pay it forward whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major company which provides energy for the Northwest Region of the U.S.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I believe that to whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to successfully resettle refugees from war torn countries across the globe to their challenging new life in the US.

lenders.name: DHJ
lenders.loan_because: Individual economic independence will advance the cause of freedom more than any government or institution
lenders.occupational_info: I help people manage their personal investments and finances.

lenders.name: The Robertson Family
lenders.loan_because: We are thrilled and humbled to be able to do this for other businesses. We own 2 businesses and know the costs of doing business for ourselves. We want to help others attain their goals for their families, and see great success in their business. Great reward is deserved for those who work so hard to make their lives better. Those in need through Kiva deserve help in making their lives better - they are working hard!
lenders.occupational_info: We offer home and commercial mortgage loans for properties located in most of the states in the United States! We offer competitive rates and unbeatable service with access to hundreds of loan programs to fit any need or goal.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: There's a saying that goes "give a man a fish and he can eat for a day; give a man a fishing pole and he can eat for years." Loans seem like a respectful way to help disadvantaged people improve their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a scientist.  My research is focused on preventing cancer.

lenders.name: Eura
lenders.loan_because:

William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice",
